alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 1:38PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Hamilton County through 215 PM EDT... At 137 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Cranberry Lake to Eagle Bay. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Blue Mountain Lake, Lake Eaton Campground, Brown Tract Pond Campground, Forked Lake Public Campground, Long Lake, Hasbroucks, Nehasane, Russian Lake, Eagle Nest, Quaker Beach, Catlin Lake, Deerland, Sabattis, Partlow, Robinwood, Woods, Little Tupper Lake and Lake Lila. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for eastern New York.
